list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment:
Now the pizza in the summary always show all toppings on it neatly and nicely. Including buttons functionality. The main problem was me not counting the parts right, and also some stuff with @dimen inside layout parameters, and setting gravity.
Also added some constants where I should.

task.summary: Default task
added order summary activity
added order summary activity
added Part and Pizza classes. Bindings which I don't know if will work and some "default" constructors for all classes as I can't find a way to use the json automatically for that.
just connecting between main activity to order_summary_activity to enable testing
adding buttons at the bottom
Finally able to pin the buttons to the bottom.
Started working on reading from a json file into the order text view
was able to change the textView
app.iml was not added
gradling and creating strings
deleting misplaced pojos, to accept the master's pojos locations
1. Creating test order object for testing. 2. Starting to write a more design-precise layout
Applied hard coded design as close a possible to original design
Created an example of an order object, and developed the algorithm to display it on screen. Design loads and stays intact.
Can now print an Order Object fairly well, according to an object that I created as a test.
Added an overly simplified activities following pressing the delivery and pickup buttons for more 'flow'
added buttons colors when pressed, padded each pizza text
Some updates in response to rebasing: Mainly matching OrderSummary code to changes in the pizza model code
Connecting the order component from main activity with the order summary activity. Added a delivery and pickup screen, but you can't go back from them yet (the order disappears)
minor changes - changed testOrder name to finalOrder
commit for gradle changes
deleted the json handlers from order summary class
verifying after rebase that everything works as expected
code review changes
adding missing pickup picture

A first patch for saving data between activities (main, orderSummary, delivery and pickup) mainly using launchMode=singleTop in the manifest and changing the intents in OrderSummary
For now, works great, will clean in next commit
Cleaned code, removed launchMode line from main activity as it was redundant
changed manifest of order summary meta data: parent activity to be correct: main activity
1. corrected pizza price in receipt 2. minor mistake in manifest, and the annoying googleIndexing warning 3. added the app colors with descriptive and functional names
commiting before pull
commiting before pull

Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/izipris/pizzapp
# Conflicts: # .idea/vcs.xml
Logo, Toolbar color, Add More Button, colors of bottom buttons
Now it actually runs, and puts the pizza text in the right place.

Added the Add More button functionality: the same as backToMain.
Changed Crust and Size captions to be not all capital letters.

Printing the text of one pizza works, including returning and changing it by all buttons.
Fixed the "Lets" to "Let's" in the app intro.
